about_the_game:
Hentai Yumiko is an exciting puzzle game with erotic content that lets you enjoy assembling beautiful and seductive images. The main heroine of the game is the stunning Yumiko—a confident, charming, and mature woman who knows how to captivate and attract attention. Each completed puzzle will reveal new sides of her alluring image.

You will gradually unlock new scenes by solving puzzles of varying difficulty. Each image is a work of art that showcases Yumiko’s beauty and sensuality.

Three difficulty levels:

  • Easy — for those who want to quickly complete puzzles and enjoy the content.

  • Medium — a perfect balance between challenge and relaxation.

  • Hard — for players looking for real puzzle-solving challenges.

Game Features:

  • 30 levels with unique seductive images;

  • 30 achievements for true puzzle enthusiasts;

  • Gallery to view unlocked illustrations;

  • Different difficulty levels to suit any playstyle;

  • Relaxing, sensual music for full immersion.

Solve puzzles, unlock intimate scenes, and enjoy the unique atmosphere of Hentai Yumiko—a game that captivates, seduces, and brings true satisfaction.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended exclusively for an adult audience, as it contains mature content, including frequent nudity and explicit sexual scenes.

A significant part of the gallery features images of naked bodies, highlighting underwear, exposed legs, buttocks, breasts, genitalia, and the use of various toys.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB GeForce or AMD GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
